description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission reference 244477FUL dated 30.01.2025 for 'Single storey timber outbuilding in rear garden for use as office'. Amendments seeks addition of x1 double glazed window to the front of the timber office and black guttering to the rear of the office
decision_conditions: The proposed non-material amendments to 244477FUL dated 30.01.2025 can be ACCEPTED as non-material amendments with approved plans referenced: Floor Plan, Plan View, Elevation A View, Elevation B View, Elevation C View, Elevation D View, Details, in accordance with section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Government Guidance Greater flexibility for planning permissions (2010) and the Ealing Council Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following a grant of Planning Permission (2011).
